item.label: Agricultural land not fulfilling the forest criteria
Built-up land not fulfilling the forest criteria
Tree with branches and twigs and resembles a live tree except for leaves
Tree with no twig, but with persistent small and large branches
Sound, blade does not sink or is bounced off
Moderate, blade partly sinks into the piece of wood or there has been some wood loss
Rotten, blade sinks well into the piece, there is extensive wood loss and the piece is crumbly
